name: Sleep Sounds - iOS & Android app Design
description:
About Project

Do you need to relax after a hard day or just improve your sleep to feel focused and healthy? Our app will help you. You can relax and sleep with sleeping sounds, nature sounds, rain sounds, fairy tales and meditation music and much more. Enjoy the high quality sleep sounds, HQ Music and wake up refreshed.


Libraries

In creating interface design for the iOS platform, I use 2 libraries that I created. This is a library of native elements and a pack of native icons from Apple. These libraries allow me to design the interface I need very quickly and efficiently.


These libraries are free and I have downloaded them for you. Download links can be found below.


iOS 15 UI Kit Component

SF Symbols (SVG | Font)
